required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of AK119 (Anti-CD73) in Combination With AK104 in Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1a/1b, Multicenter, Open-Label, Dose-Escalation and Dose-Expansion Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Anti-tumor Activity of AK119 in Combination With AK104 in Subjects With Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a first-in-human (FIH), Phase 1a/1b, Multicenter, Open-Label, Dose-Escalation and Dose-Expansion Study to Evaluate the Safety, Pharmacokinetics, and Anti-tumor Activity of AK119 (Anti-CD73) in Combination with AK104 in Subjects with Advanced or Metastatic Solid Tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events (AEs)
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the time of informed consent signed through 90 days after the last dose of study drug
primary_outcome.description: An AE is defined as any untoward medical occurrence in a participant administered a pharmaceutical product temporally associated with the use of study treatment, whether or not considered related to the study treatment.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with a Dose Limiting Toxicity (DLT)
primary_outcome.description: DLTs will be assessed during the first 6 weeks of treatment for dose-escalation phase and are defined as toxicities that meet pre-defined severity criteria, and assessed as having a suspected relationship to study drug, and unrelated to disease, disease progression, inter-current illness, or concomitant medications that occurs within the first 6 weeks of treatment.

secondary_outcome.description: The ORR is defined as the proportion of subjects with confirmed CR or confirmed PR, based on RECIST Version 1.1
The DCR is defined as the proportion of subjects with CR, PR, or SD (subjects achieving SD will be included in the DCR if they maintain SD for ≥8 weeks) based on RECIST Version 1.1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed concentration (Cmax) of AK119 and AK104
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug through 30 days after last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: The endpoints for assessment of PK include serum concentrations of AK119 and AK104 at different timepoints after study drug administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Minimum observed concentration (Cmin) of AK119 and AK104 at steady state
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug through 30 days after last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: The endpoints for assessment of PK include serum concentrations of AK119 and AK104 at different timepoints after study drug administration.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects who develop detectable anti-drug antibodies (ADAs)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first dose of study drug through 90 days after last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: The immunogenicity of AK119 and AK104 will be assessed by summarizing the number of subjects who develop detectable antidrug antibodies (ADAs).

intervention.description: Subjects will receive AK119 by intravenous administration.
After AK119 IV, on the same day subjects will receive AK104 by intravenous administration.

facility.name: Blacktown Cancer and Haematology Centre (Blacktown Hospital)
